introduction.para: When the data you use for your map changes, you can refresh it manually in 3D Maps. The changes will then be reflected on your map. Here’s how:

listItem.para: In 3D Maps, click Home > Refresh Data.

content.para: To add new data to your 3D MapsTE104085179:

listItem.para: In 3D Maps, go to the map you want to add data to.
Leaving the 3D Maps window open, click in Excel and select the worksheet data you want to add.
On the Excel ribbon, click Insert > Map arrow > Add Selected Data to Power Map.

content.para: Your 3D Maps will automatically update to show the additional data.
